import Link from 'next/link'; import { useRouter } from 'next/router'; import React from 'react'; import { Button } from '../../components/Button'; import { Panel } from '../../components/Panel'; import faker from 'faker'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faInfoCircle, faPlus, faThumbsDown, faThumbsUp, } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import UserLink from '../../components/UserLink'; import { formatMoney } from '../../utils/base-utils'; import { faDiscord } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; const ReputationSubApp = () => { const router = useRouter(); return (
{[ { name: faker.name.findName(), type: -1, amount: 10, content: faker.lorem.text(), }, { name: faker.name.findName(), type: 1, amount: 2, content: faker.lorem.text(), }, { name: faker.name.findName(), type: 0, amount: 0, content: faker.lorem.text(), }, { name: faker.name.findName(), type: 1, amount: 400, content: faker.lorem.text(), }, { name: faker.name.findName(), type: 1, amount: 24, content: faker.lorem.text(), }, { name: faker.name.findName(), type: 0, amount: 0, content: faker.lorem.text(), }, { name: faker.name.findName(), type: 0, amount: 0, content: faker.lorem.text(), }, ].map((rep) => { const textType = rep.type > 0 ? 'Positive' : rep.type < 0 ? 'Negative' : 'Neutral'; const textColor = rep.type > 0 ? 'text-positive-cta' : rep.type < 0 ? 'text-negative-cta' : ''; return ( ); })}
Name Type Amount Comment
0 ? faThumbsUp : rep.type < 0 ? faThumbsDown : faInfoCircle } />

{textType}

 {rep.amount ? formatMoney(rep.amount) : '--'}
